AccuWebHosting: VPS, Dedi, and Shared Hosting in 14 Locations!

accuwebhosting, cheap shared hosting, cheap vps, cpanel July 21, 2021 @ 12:00 am, by raindog308

AccuWebHosting contacted us to offer a full range of offers – VPS, dedicated, and shared hosting.  These are available in:

  • N. Virginia, USA
  • Ohio, USA
  • Oregon, USA
  • Mumbai, India
  • Seoul, South Korea
  • Singapore
  • Sydney, Australia
  • Tokyo, Japan
  • Montreal, Canada
  • Frankfurt, Germany
  • Ireland
  • London, UK
  • Paris, France
  • JHB, South Africa

…so pretty much everywhere!  Be sure to check out the bandwidth – small on the VPS, more than abundant on the dedi, and a good amount on shared.  It’ll probably come down to location so be sure to check their latency tool after the jump.

BTW, If the name AccuWebHosting sounds familiar, it’s because we highlighted them in our review of providers who offer free trials.

They accept PayPal, Credit Cards, and International Debit Cards. Their Terms of Service is available on their web site.

Here’s a little about AccuWebHosting in their own words:

“AccuWebHosting offers web hosting services since 2003. They have clients across the globe. AccuWeb offers Shared Hosting, VPS Hosting, Reseller Hosting, Cloud Hosting, WordPress Hosting, Forex VPS, Dedicated Servers and much more. If you are a start-up business or looking for a high-end solution for your mission-critical application, AccuWeb Hosting has all solutions for your requirement. When it comes to technical support, no one can beat AccuWeb Hosting’s 24/7 technical support.”

Have you been a AccuWebHosting customer? Please share your experience in the comments below.

Now read more to see the offers!
